:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "material-theme-lighter" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-lighter' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript material-theme-lighter torchlight' style='background-color: #FAFAFA;color: #90A4AE;--theme-selection-background: #CCD7DA80'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #CFD8DC; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #E2931D;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #6182B8;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #9C3EDA;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">{</span><span class="token">

:::end
<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-lighter' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript material-theme-lighter torchlight' style='background-color: #FAFAFA;color: #90A4AE;--theme-selection-background: #CCD7DA80'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #CFD8DC; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #E2931D;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #6182B8;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #9C3EDA;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #90A4AE;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #39ADB5;">{</span><span class="token">
